title: Théâtre antique de Tarquimpol
description: The ancient theater of Tarquimpol is located at the ancient settlement of Decempagi, present-day Tarquimpol, in the Moselle department. The theater was revealed by aerial photography in 1981; the theater measures approximately 117 meters in diameter and could accommodate up to 16,000 people.

properties.title: OSM location of Théâtre antique de Tarquimpol
